ygData.subject: Re: RTS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... either in PAW or in Lake Rathe ... zone. By day, the gnolls ... sometime drops small bronze ... LAVASTORM? Confirm this, ... sure you don t mean Lake ...
ygData.messageBody:
---Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...> wrote:
>
> From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>
> The RTS is not found in Lavastorms. Its found
either in PAW or in Lake Rathe
> at the Gnoll ruins...right by the South Karana
zone. By day, the gnolls
> spawn, at night, drybone skeletons spawn, which
sometime drops small bronze
> armor.
>
> Hope this clarifies.
>
> Lana
>
>
> ----Original Message Follows----
> From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>
> Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RTS
> Date: Mon, 16 Aug 1999 08:31:52 -0700
>
> From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>
>
> whoa right there... did you say rts is available in
LAVASTORM? Confirm this,
> please... I've never seen a Gnoll in LS, are you
sure you don't mean Lake
> Rathe?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: qizam <qizam@...>
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, August 16, 1999 5:50 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...
>
>
> : From: "qizam" <qizam@...>
> :
> : use an rts until you hit abouit 25 to 30 then get
yourself a ob staff. the
> : rts can be found in lavastorm and splitpaw off of
gnoll shamans. or you
> get
> : spend 20 hours trying to get the brace rof battle
and a dwarven ringmail
> : tunic off of crush and the bracer of batle and
get a screming amce.
> :
> : Jahulaman

I have also gotten fine steel weapons off some of the
creatures that spawn at night at the gnoll camp in
Lake Rathe. The high Shamans carry the RTS and the
embalmers carry the skulls of Jahara (spelling?).
Warning: These aen't your typical undead and gnolls
though. I can safely go with aparty of 4 level 19
people.
-Kenny
